docs.summary: A post page for a specific blog post.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the information associated with the current post has been retrieved.

docs.summary: Gets the all the information associated with the current blog post.
description: The `getPost()` function returns a Promise that is resolved when all
of the information about the post shown on the `PostPage` is

examples.title: Get the current blog post's information
body: *   "plainContent":        "When it comes to design, the Wix blog has everything you need to create beautiful posts that will grab your reader's attention. You can add whatever tags you want (#vacation #dream #summer) throughout your posts to reach more people.",
*   "excerpt":             "When it comes to design, the Wix blog has everything you need to create beautiful posts that will grab your reader's attention. You can add whatever tags you want..."

docs.summary:
An object representing a blog post on a post page.
> **Note:**
`viewCount` and `likeCount` data used on your site pages is eventually consistent and may require up
to 24 hours to update. To make sure new post views and likes are included on your site in real time,
[disable caching](https://support.wix.com/en/article/caching-your-sites-pages) for
any page that uses `viewCount` or `likeCount` data. Note that disabling caching may increase your page loading time.

examples.title: Get the current blog post's information
body: *   "plainContent":        "When it comes to design, the Wix blog has everything you need to create beautiful posts that will grab your reader's attention. You can add whatever tags you want (#vacation #dream #summer) throughout your posts to reach more people.",
*   "excerpt":             "When it comes to design, the Wix blog has everything you need to create beautiful posts that will grab your reader's attention. You can add whatever tags you want..."

members.name: publishedDate
members.doc: Date the post was originally published.

members.name: viewCount
members.doc: Number of times the post was viewed.

members.name: likeCount
members.doc: Number of likes the post received.

members.name: commentCount
members.doc: Number of comments the post received.

members.name: lastPublishedDate
members.doc: Date the post was most recently published.

members.name: coverImageDisplayed
members.doc: Indicates whether the cover image is displayed in the post.

members.name: timeToRead
members.doc: Estimated time in minutes required to read the post.

members.name: pinned
members.doc: Indicates whether the post was pinned to the top of the blog feed.

members.name: featured
members.doc: Indicates whether the post is set as featured in the post settings. Featured posts appear in custom blog feeds.

members.name: hashtags
members.doc: List of all hashtags in the post.

members.name: postPageUrl
members.doc: Relative URL of the post page on your published site.

members.name: excerpt
members.doc:
A few lines of text that appear in the blog feed. Defined 
in [Post Settings](https://support.wix.com/en/article/editing-excerpts-in-the-new-wix-blog) or default of first 160 characters of the post.
